algorithmDesc.anomaly_detection: Detect abnormal fluctuations in operational metrics such as CPU spikes, memory leaks, and network traffic anomalies to help identify root causes quickly.
algorithmDesc.timeseries_predict: Predict future trends based on historical monitoring data for capacity planning, resource scheduling, and dynamic alert threshold adjustment.
algorithmDesc.classification: Intelligently classify operational text such as ticket types, alert severity levels, and fault categories to improve automation.
algorithmDesc.image_classification: Recognize operational image content such as equipment status, dashboard screenshots, and topology diagrams for visual operations scenarios.
algorithmDesc.object_detection: Detect specific objects in images such as cabinet labels, device locations, and abnormal indicator lights for data center inspection.
algorithmDesc.log_clustering: Intelligently cluster massive logs to discover patterns, reduce alert noise, and accelerate troubleshooting.

mlops-common.creator: Creator
mlops-common.archivingMsg: After archiving, this version will be marked as obsolete.
mlops-common.versionIptMsg: Please enter a semantic version number, e.g., v1.0.0
mlops-common.portDesc: Specifies the operating port for the model service. If left blank, the system will automatically assign an available port.

datasets.uploadHintTimeseries: CSV file must contain columns: timestamp, value
datasets.uploadHintClassification: CSV file must contain columns: text, label
datasets.uploadHintImageClassification: Supports common image formats, max 2MB per image
datasets.uploadHintObjectDetection: Supports common image formats, max 2MB per image
datasets.uploadHintLogClustering: TXT file, one log record per line

model-release.delModelContent: Are you sure you want to delete this model?
model-release.capabilityTip: The option to control whether this capability is made available externally.

algorithmConfig.title: Algorithm Config
algorithmConfig.pageDescription: Manage algorithm configuration including algorithm name, Docker image, form config, etc.
algorithmConfig.searchPlaceholder: Search algorithm name or display name
algorithmConfig.algorithmNameTooltip: The unique identifier ID for the algorithm must match the actual algorithm registration name within the algorithm image.

serving-guide.title: Usage Guide
serving-guide.endpointTip: Replace <Server IP> with the IP address of the server where the service is deployed
serving-guide.requestBodyPlaceholder: Enter request data in JSON format
serving-guide.testTip: serving_id will be auto-filled. You only need to modify the test data in data field
serving-guide.testTipNew: Only need to modify the test data in request body
serving-guide.serviceNotRunning: Service is not running. Please start the service before testing
serving-guide.invalidJson: Invalid JSON format in request body
serving-guide.serverUrlTip: Enter the server address where the model service is deployed, without port number

anomalyDetection.request: The data array contains time series data points, each with timestamp (Unix timestamp) and value (numeric) fields; config.threshold is optional for setting anomaly threshold
anomalyDetection.response: In the response, is_anomaly indicates whether it is an anomaly point, score is the anomaly score (higher means more likely to be anomaly)

timeseriesPredict.request: The data array contains historical time series data points; config.steps is required, specifying the number of future steps to predict
timeseriesPredict.response: The response contains a predictions array with predicted results, each point includes predicted timestamp and value

logClustering.request: The data array contains log text strings; config.return_details is optional, set to true to return detailed clustering information
logClustering.response: The response contains a clusters array with clustering results, each cluster includes template, log count, and actual log content

classification.request: The texts array contains text strings to be classified; config.top_k is optional, specifying the number of top classification results to return
classification.response: The response contains a results array with classification results, each record includes predicted category and probability distribution

imageClassification.request: The images array contains base64-encoded image data; config.top_k is optional, specifying the number of top classification results to return
imageClassification.response: The response contains a results array with classification results, each image returns predicted category and confidence list

objectDetection.request: The images array contains base64-encoded image data; config.conf_threshold is optional for setting confidence threshold
objectDetection.response: The response contains a results array with detection results, each image returns detected objects and their bounding box coordinates
